title: "Eric and Wendy Schmidt back Cambridge University effort to equip researchers with AI skills"
excerpt: "Eric and Wendy Schmidt have donated to a Cambridge University program that is designed to equip young researchers with machine learning and artificial intelligence skills that have the potential to accelerate their research."
